name: EILF - Alchemy Pack
detailed_description:
Alchemy transforms adjacent beneficial items into coins or adjacent coins into beneficial items.

The Alchemy Pack adds a random game mechanic. Clicking on an alchemy stone will transform all adjacent beneficial items into coins and all adjacent coins into beneficial items. This item has no effect on guards, walls or most game board altering game pieces.
about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 fullscreen or any resolution windowed
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 128 MB available space
